<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Second Wind](/Feats.aspx?ID=5816) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath. When you [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802), you can choose to gain  temporary HP from the Rage even if 1 minute hasn't passed (or a full turn if you have the [revitalizing rage class feature](/Classes.aspx?ID=2)). If you do, once this Rage ends you become [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73) until you rest for 10 minutes.
name: Second Wind
